title: Disconnected from server after games
body:
After almost every game I finish I get a message in my client saying that I've been disconnected from the server. The client then closes and I never get to see the post game stats plus I have to reopen the client after every game.
If anyone can tell me what's wrong or how to fix this it would be awesome.
I'm not sure if it makes a difference but this is on a mac.
Thanks for any advice :)

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you try disabling the IP Helper service for me, the steps to do so are below.

>1. Hold the Windows key and press R, enter "services.msc" (without the quotes) and press Enter
2. Scroll down to the IP Helper service, right click on it and select Properties
3. In the dropdown box that says "Automatic" or "Manual", set it to Disabled and then click on "Apply"
4. Then click on "Stop" to stop the service from running in the current session
5. Click OK to exit the dialog

If this doesn't help let me know so we can explore further possible causes for this issue.
